title.u: How to divide using the calculator

shortdesc.i: Here you will find the instruction of divide feature in JPS calculator app.

li.i: Basic knowledge of using a calculator application on your device.
An existing monthly budget plan with the original expense amounts.

p.i: Divide a specific expense in your monthly budget plan by a certain factor, such as a percentage decrease or a change in quantity, using a calculator application.

cmd.i: Launch the calculator application on your device.
Identify the expense you want to divide by a factor.
Determine the factor to be applied (e.g., percentage decrease, change in quantity)
Enter the original expense amount into the calculator.
Select the division symbol (typically represented by "รท" or "/") on the calculator.
Enter the factor value into the calculator.
Press the "=" button to calculate the new expense amount.

result.i: The result from the division is displayed.

li.i: Enter the original expense amount, which is $800.
Enter the factor value, which is 0.75

p.i: Result: The calculator application will display the new expense amount, which in this case is $600. Therefore, after applying a 25% decrease, the new expense amount is $600.
